mapper.select: SELECT f.free_id, f.title, f.content, f.region_gu, f.region_dong, f.view_count, f.created_at, f.item_condition, f.deal_status, m.nickname FROM free f JOIN member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id WHERE f.free_id = #{freeId}

SELECT f.free_id, f.title, f.category, f.region_gu, f.view_count, f.item_condition, i.img_url, i.repimg_yn FROM free f JOIN free_img i ON f.free_id = i.free_id AND i.repimg_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY f.free_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free (title, member_id, category, region_gu, region_dong, content, item_condition) VALUES (#{title}, #{memberId}, #{category}, #{regionGu}, #{regionDong}, #{content}, #{itemCondition})
mapper.select:
